rows.label: qst711901_msg0002
rows.name:
My Driver looks like an overgrown
furball, but he's really a seasoned
merc, a real hard nut.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0003
rows.name:
Thing is, I think he's gone in over his
head this time. This job's too much
for him to handle.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0004
rows.name:
So we've been looking around for
Drivers with a good track record
who'd be able to join him.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0005
rows.name:
I can tell just by looking that you
folks aren't some lousy Sunday Drivers.
You must've seen real combat.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0006
rows.name:
Interested? But first I'll want to see
how you'd measure up in a fight.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0008
rows.name:
Let's have you pull off a second-stage
Blade Combo. Say, about five times.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0009
rows.name:
Doesn't matter which elements you use.
Just do any Special, and then any other
one that's level 2 or above, five times.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0010
rows.name:
And obviously, since you can rely on
your allies for linking up the Specials,
you might wanna try to mix it up.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0011
rows.name:
The place, time, and target's up
to you. I just want to know if your
Blade Combos are up to scratch.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0012
rows.name:
I may look like a meathead,
but I know my ether.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0013
rows.name:
I can feel someone of your power level
pull off a Special, wherever you are.

rows.label: qst711901_msg0014
rows.name:
Anyway, I've talked long enough.
Hope you've got what it takes.
